price: 3. Waxaa samooyinka iyo arlada ugu sugan calaamooyin mu’miniinta.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi laāyātin lil'mu'minīna
